name: Centro Hotel Augusta
description: Wohnen bei Tante ALMA vormals Augusta is located in Mannheim, a 10-minute walk from Luisenpark, and offers free WiFi. A 13-minute walk from National Theatre Mannheim, the property is also 1.8 km away from University of Mannheim. The property is close to popular attractions like Kunsthalle Mannheim, Wasserturm and Mannheim Baroque Palace. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, while some rooms at Wohnen bei Tante ALMA vormals Augusta also have a seating area. All rooms have a wardrobe. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Maimarkt Mannheim is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Mannheim Baroque Palace is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 3 km from Wohnen bei Tante ALMA vormals Augusta.

name: Syte
description: Situated directly across from Mannheim Main Station, this 4-star boutique design hotel is centrally located in Mannheim. Syte Boutique Hotel Mannheim Hotel Mannheim offers elegant interiors and free WiFi throughout as well as an on-site restaurant and fitness room. Featuring chic furnishings and dark parquet floors, all rooms at this boutique design hotel come with large windows, air conditioning, a 40-inch flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony, and some a well-equipped kitchen. Guests are welcome to relax in the bar and on the terrace. There are also meeting facilities on site. Syte Boutique Hotel Mannheim Hotel Mannheim is 800 metres from Mannheim University and 1.1 km from the National Theatre. Frankfurt Airport is a 1-hour drive from the hotel.

name: Best Western Plus Delta Park Hotel
description: The Best Western Plus Delta Park Hotel is just a five-minute walk from the main train station and the 'Planken' shopping mile. 147 comfortable and spacious rooms in six different categories await you. All rooms are equipped with safe, flat screen TV, coffee & tea making facilities, large desk, bathroom with bathtub, hair dryer and cosmetic mirror. Starting from our business category our rooms are air-conditioned! Wi-Fi is free of charge for our guests throughout the house. Most of the rooms were renovated in 2019. The Best Western Plus Delta Park Hotel is the ideal location for your event. Would you like to hold a conference, seminar or celebration? Our professional banquet team will be happy to advise you and will certainly find the right thing for you! The Best Western Plus Delta Park Hotel has seven air-conditioned and bright conference rooms as well as three meeting rooms. Our restaurant 'Europa Garten' is ideally suited for your event, or simply come to eat a la carte. Our unique winter garden and our green garden terrace in the heart of the hotel invite you to linger. To round off the evening, treat yourself to a drink at our cozy sunset bar.bestwestern.com

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Mannheim
description: This hotel is located in Mannheim lies opposite the famous water tower, a 12-minute walk from Mannheim Train Station. Leonardo Royal Hotel Mannheim features a free WiFi, terrace and a fitness area. The rooms and suites at Leonardo Royal Hotel Mannheim come with a refrigerator, air conditioning, and a safe. Most also feature a flat-screen TV. Guests are welcome to relax on the garden terrace. The business lounge has a free internet. A breakfast buffet is available each morning. The restaurant serves Mediterranean specialities throughout the day. The Schatzkistl music cabaret is located within the hotel.

name: Holiday Inn Mannheim City - Hauptbahnhof
description: A modern business and leisure hotel in Mannheim with an all-day restaurant, meeting rooms and a Dallmayr coffee shop.Holiday Inn® Mannheim City – Hauptbahnhof is located next to the main train station, only a five minutes walk away from the Rhine river banks and 1.5km to the city centre. Mannheim Airport (MHG) is a 20-minute drive from the hotel.Families as well as leisure travellers will love the close proximity to the river Rhine as well as the good accessibility to famous sight like Luisenpark, Water Tower or Kunsthalle by public transportation. If you’re here on business, our meeting rooms are providing you with space for up to 90 guests and the open lobby is a brilliant working and meeting area. For bigger meetings, the Congress Centre Rosengarten is a 10-minute drive away. All rooms have floor-to-ceiling windows, blackout blinds, air conditioning, walk-in-showers and a choice of pillows for a good night’s rest. Kids stay and eat free.Our spacious Open Lobby offers all-day-dining as well as the possibility to grab snacks and a cup of Dallmayr coffee if you’re in a hurry. Plug in your laptop to work at the E-Bar, the Media Lounge is also great for an informal meeting or a relaxing drink.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Nyx Hotel Mannheim By Leonardo Hotels
description: Offering free WiFi throughout, this elegant design hotel is situated in central Mannheim just 200 metres from the City Hall. The NYX Hotel Mannheim by Leonardo Hotels offers stylish rooms with modern décor. The rooms at the NYX Hotel Mannheim by Leonardo Hotels are brightly furnished and spacious. A rich breakfast buffet is available each morning. Marktplatz tram stop is a 4-minute walk away, offering direct links to Mannheim Main Station, located 15-20 minutes walking distance from the property. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Kunsthalle (art gallery) and the Rosengarten Congress Centre. Mannheim Airport and the city of Ludwigshafen are a 10-minute drive away, and Frankfurt Airport can be reached in 50 minutes by car.

name: Intercityhotel Mannheim
description: This hotel in Mannheim is located just steps from Mannheim Train Station and 700 metres from Mannheim Palace. It offers modern rooms and free WiFi. All of the air-conditioned rooms at the Intercityhotel Mannheim feature soundproofed windows, and include a minibar, flat-screen TV and work desk. A rich breakfast buffet is available each morning. Drinks and snacks are available at the bar, and the stylish restaurant serves a range of international dishes. Mannheim Castle and Gardens are a 5-minute walk from the Intercityhotel, and the university is just 300 metres away.

name: Motel One Mannheim
description: No description found

name: NH Mannheim
description: The NH Mannheim is ideally located for business travelers as well as those who want to explore the city and region. It’s close to the superhighway and near major companies in the area, including Siemens and Leica. It’s also convenient for events at the SAP area and for the city’s Planetarium. On-site parking is available. The hotel has 225 rooms spread across six floors. All are air-conditioned and offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs with international channels. Rooms are perfect for relaxing and there are desks for catching up with work. A choice of pillows and super-comfortable mattresses ensure a good night’s sleep. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner at the hotel. A generous buffet breakfast, featuring pastries, cheeses, fruit juices, breads and gluten-free, and children’s options starts the day. In the evenings, the restaurant serves international and local specialties. Drinks and snacks are on the menu at the hotel bar. Meetings and events are well-catered for at the hotel, which has 8 meeting rooms with a total capacity of 128. Rooms are fully equipped with meeting technology and have natural light. A spacious gym is available for guests who want to work out and unwind.NH Hoteles

name: Lanzcarré Hotel Mannheim, a member of Radisson Individuals
description: Located in the heart of Mannheim, LanzCarré Hotel Mannheim, a member of Radisson Individuals, offers comfortable rooms and free use of a fitness centre. Free WiFi internet access is available throughout the hotel. All rooms at the LanzCarré Hotel are designed in modern style, featuring flat-screen TV and an en suite bathroom. The apartment includes a fully equipped kitchenette. A breakfast buffet is offered each morning, and the hotel restaurant specialises in serving international cuisine. Guests can relax in the bar which includes Sky TV and has a wide range of whisky. It is a short work to the centre of Mannheim, and the popular Mannheim Palace is a 5-minute drive away. LanzCarré Hotel is 1 km from Mannheim Train Station, and it is a 10-minute drive to the A6 motorway. Private parking is available in an underground garage at the hotel.

name: Mercure Hotel Mannheim Am Friedensplatz
description: Mercure Mannheim am Friedensplatz is just steps from the most important sites such as the Congress Center Rosengarten, SAP Arena, Water Tower and Luisenpark. The hotel offers 180 comfortable rooms, 10 meeting rooms with natural light, 120 parking spaces with barrier-free access to all areas, an elegant lobby bar, restaurant and sun terrace.accorhotels.com

name: Maritim Hotel Mannheim
description: Maritim Hotel Mannheim is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Mannheim. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service, restaurant, laundry service. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, desk, mini bar. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, indoor pool, massage, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Mannheim, Maritim Hotel Mannheim will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Hilton Garden Inn Mannheim
description: Our Hilton Garden Inn Mannheim is perfectly located next to the main station of Mannheim in the new Kepler Quartier, only a few steps from the city centre. You’ll find shopping, dining and local attractions such as, “Jungbusch, the Congress Center Rosengarten, SAP Arena, Luisenpark, and the Water Tower of Mannheim all within easy reach. Experience our restaurant with an open view kitchen offering international cuisine and barbeque grills. There is also a 24 hours Pavilion Pantry® in the Lobby, a mini market which offers a variety of drinks and snacks. Our leafy atrium and bar are the perfect place to escape the city and relax. Frankfurt Airport (FRA) can easily be reached by high-speed ICE Train within 30 minutes and 45 minutes by car.Hilton

name: Best Western Plaza Hotel Mannheim
description: The Plaza Hotel Mannheim is the perfect place to stay during your visit of the Rhein-Neckar-City of Mannheim. With its 121 newly renovated and well decorated rooms, the Plaza Hotel will provide you with an outstanding comfort and ease while you are enjoying the hotel’s contemporary atmosphere and ambience. We would love to take care of your wellbeing after a hard day at work or after a long day of sightseeing. Therefore, all rooms are supplied with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a bathroom with a spacious shower and kettle to prepare coffee and tea. You are also welcome to have a cold or a hot beverage or even a tasty snack at our bar area, which is open 24 hours a day and where you can have a cozy seat and enjoy your stay with us. At the disposal of our business travel guest we offer two bright and comfortable conference rooms, suitable for various group sizes, equipped with state-of-the-art technology that could be arranged to suit your requirements and provide the perfect setting in which you can realize your ideas Additionally, we would take care complete catering including coffee breaks, lunch menus and other services of our restaurant according to the individual wishes and requirements of our clients. The city of Mannheim is giving its visitors an extraordinary mix of culture and history, along with a vibrant nightlife. All of which is just a leap away from the Plaza Hotel. In no time, you can reach one of the numerous attractions that the city has to offer. Whether it is visiting one of the various museums, strolling through the historic city centre, famous for its square design, just going over to see the magnificent Baroque palace or going for a night out, all those locations can be easily reached from the hotel by tram or by bus. 'Exerzierplatz' station is only a short walk away from the hotel.bestwestern.com

name: Pension Neon
description: No description found

name: Mercure Hotel Mannheim am Rathaus
description: The Mercure Hotel Mannheim am Rathaus combines the advantages of a relaxing stay with all the amenities business travelers could wish for. Stay right where your meeting happens. Hold events and meetings in our 7 meeting rooms. As a guest of our conference hotel in Mannheim, you will spend the night in a great location. The city center and many sights are within easy reach. All air-conditioned rooms are non-smoking and include WIFI.accorhotels.com

name: Wasserturm Hotel Mannheim
description: Set in an art-nouveau building in Mannheim city centre, this family-run hotel free WiFi access. Congress Center Rosengarten is a 10-minute walk away. It's possible to request a rental car. Wasserturm Hotel Mannheim has individually furnished rooms with a TV, desk and bathroom. Breakfast is available each morning. Pestalozzischule Tram Stop is a 5-minute walk away, connecting you to the SAP Arena and Mannheim Central Station. Public parking is available nearby and may be subject to an additional charge. The property is just 5 minutes from the A6 motorway. Guests can go for relaxing walks in the large Luisenpark Park, just 600 metres away.

name: Leonardo Hotel Mannheim City Center
description: This modern hotel in the heart of Mannheim is just a short stroll from the Rosengarten congress centre, the Planken and Kunststraße shopping streets, and Mannheim Main Station. The Leonardo Hotel Mannheim City Center offers quiet rooms with all modern amenities, including a 32-inch flat-screen HD TV and air conditioning. Start your day with a rich breakfast buffet, and treat yourself to delicious, regional and international specialities in the restaurant, La Terrazza. You can enjoy your meal outside on the terrace in fine weather. The Bistro-Bar Optimus awaits you in the evening.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Mannheim
description: This 4-star-Superior hotel is situated in Mannheim, 500 metres from the National Theatre. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. All rooms at at the Radisson Blu Hotel, Mannheim come with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms also include a seating area. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The University of Mannheim is 900 metres from the Radisson Blu Hotel, while Luisenpark is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Dorint Kongresshotel Mannheim
description: This 4-star superior hotel offers direct access to Mannheim's Rosengarten Congress Centre, creative cuisine, and a small wellness area. The Planken shopping street is a 3-minute walk away. The spacious rooms and suites of the Dorint Kongresshotel Mannheim feature a modern design, satellite TV, and free WiFi. Wellness facilities at the Dorint Mannheim include a Finnish sauna and a fitness centre with modern equipment. A fine selection of drinks and creative Mediterranean and regional specialities are served in the hotel bar, Die Bar, which was renovated to feature modern design with retro elements. Guests can have breakfast in the Symphonie restaurant or dine under the shade of chestnut trees on the terrace. A large, public underground garage is located directly next to the Dorint Mannheim.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Mannheim City
description: The Sure Hotel by Best Western Mannheim City is located in the center of Mannheim, an important business and university location between Frankfurt am Main and Stuttgart. From year to year the city attracts more and more tourists besides business travelers and students. The main train station can be reached in five minutes by car. To City Airport Mannheim MHG, it takes about 15 minutes by car, to Stuttgart STR Airport or Frankfurt am Main FRA a maximum of one and a half hours. Our centrally located house has 162 comfortable hotel rooms with three different room categories. All rooms are equipped with shower/WC, hair dryer, desk, direct dial telephone, cable TV, Sky, room safe and some of our rooms have a small kitchen (on request) and free Wi-Fi access.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Mack
description: Located in the heart of Mannheim, this family-run, 3-star hotel is just a 2-minute walk from the historic National Theatre. Massage facilities and spacious accommodation are offered here. Behind the charming Art Deco exterior, the warmly decorated rooms feature rich carpets and soft lighting. Each room includes a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. Each morning a hearty buffet breakfast is served in Hotel Mack’s classic-style breakfast room. Cafés and restaurants serving international cuisine can be found within a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Guests can book relaxing treatments at Hotel Mack’s massage studio and the nearby cosmetic studio. Guests can also explore the popular Luisenpark Park or visit the Mannheim Water Tower, both less than 500 metres away. Theresienkrankenhaus bus stop is 2 minutes’ and provides great connections around the city. Mannheim Central Train Station is 1000 metres away. If you don't want to have breakfast at the property a bakery option are available next to the hotel on weekdays from 6:15 a.m. and on weekends from 8.00 a.m.

name: Pension Haus Baron 2 Friedrichsfeld
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: BoardingHouse Mannheim
description: Studios and apartments with free Wi-Fi and a fully equipped kitchenette are offered at this new hotel in the centre of Mannheim. BoardingHouse Mannheim features bright interiors with a combined living/dining area and stylish parquet floors. A 40-inch flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a coffee machine are included as standard. Some include a balcony. Nationaltheater tram stop is a 2-minute walk away, offering great public transport connections throughout Mannheim. The elegant Friedrichsplatz square with the famous Wasserturm (water tower) is just 500 metres away. Private parking can be booked at BoardingHouse Mannheim. The romantic city of Heidelberg is within a 20-minute drive.

name: Ariva Boardinghouse Platanenhof
description: These apartments are a clever and affordable place to stay in Mannheim, whether for an overnight stay or over a longer period. All apartments feature free wifi. The apartments at the Ariva Boardinghouse Platanenhof are tastefully and comfortably furnished with one or 2 rooms, and a fully-equipped kitchenette. The apartments are ideal for couples, families or groups of friends.

name: Rhein Neckar Hotel
description: This hotel in Mannheim offers well-equipped rooms and apartments with free Wi-Fi internet. It is located in the Neckarstadt district, a 5-minute drive from the Rosengarten congress centre. The privately run Rhein Neckar Hotel provides spacious rooms with cable TV channels. The large apartments can accommodate up to 9 people. A German-style breakfast buffet is available each morning. The Rhein Neckar Hotel also offers a takeaway business breakfast. The A6 motorway can be reached in less than 10 minutes by car.

name: Moxy Ludwigshafen
address: Im Zollhof 5, 67061 Ludwigshafen am Rhein, Rhineland-Palatinate
description: Ludwigshafen is the home of chemical giant BASF and many other industries. It’s only logical Moxy is there too. Moxy Ludwigshafen is located next to the Rhein River and adds a daring accent to the business community. Our room rates are affordable, our service is smart, and our technology is of the highest standard. Moxy plays with the rules and has a wonderful design, a laid-back lounge, and cozy rooms offering floor-to-ceiling eye candy. The super-duper fast Wi-Fi is free, and so are the computers you can use. Moxy is for play. Drinks, snacks and food are available 24 hours, but you can also sample a local spirit at the Moxy Bar. Or one of Germany’s local beers! Moxy is ideally located near the heart of Ludwigshafen and the Rhein Galerie and only 50 minutes away from Frankfurt Airport.Marriott

name: Tulip Inn Ludwigshafen City
description: This 4-star hotel is situated in the centre of Ludwigshafen in the scenic Rhineland-Palatinate region. It offers free WiFi and a swimming pool with a sauna and fitness area. Europa Hotel offers traditionally furnished rooms with satellite TV and a work desk. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer. Tasty regional dishes are available in the restaurant, and guests can relax in the bar in the evenings. Europa is just 20 km from the pretty town of Heidelberg. The Rhine-Neckar region is ideal for hiking and cycling tours. Parking is available in the hotel garage or in a parking garage, a 3-minute walk away.

name: B&B Hotel Ludwigshafen
description: Located in Ludwigshafen am Rhein, B&B Hotel Ludwigshafen provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk and a wardrobe. The private bathrooms include a shower and hair dryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the property. Additionally, vending machines offer snacks and cold drinks throughout the day. Shopping is possible in the Rhein-Galerie shopping centre, just opposite the street. Mannheim Baroque Castle is 2 km from the property. Ludwigshafen Central Station is 1.3 km and Mannheim City Airport is 7 km away.

name: Hotel Am Bismarck
description: This 3-star hotel is centrally located in the centre of Mannheim. Based a 5-minute walk from both the main train station and the Schlossgarten Gardens, it offers free Wi-Fi. Each of the rooms at the Am Bismarck hotel is classically decorated and features a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some also boast a balcony. Guests are invited by Am Bismarck to enjoy a daily breakfast buffet, and the on-site bar also provides hot snacks in the evenings. The city also has a variety of local and international restaurants and bars. The family-run hotel is an ideal base for exploring the historic city of Mannheim, which includes the National Theatre (1 km) and the Mannheim Kunsthalle gallery (a 5-minute walk away). While Mannheim Airport is 5 km from hotel Am Bismarck, the A6 and A5 motorways are both 1 km away. The Exhibition Grounds are a 6-minute drive away.

name: the niu Square
description: Situated in Mannheim, 1.1 km from Luisenpark, the niu Square features accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a business centre, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2 km from National Theatre Mannheim. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. The hotel offers a vegetarian or vegan breakfast. Mannheim Central Station is 1.9 km from the niu Square, while University of Mannheim is 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: B&B Hotel Mannheim
description: Situated in Mannheim, less than 1 km from Maimarkt Mannheim, B&B Hotel Mannheim features rooms with air conditioning. The property is located 4.9 km from National Theatre Mannheim, 5.2 km from Mannheim Central Station and 6 km from University of Mannheim. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Luisenpark. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at B&B Hotel Mannheim also feature free WiFi. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. B&B Hotel Mannheim offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Central Station Heidelberg is 15 km from the hotel, while Theatre Heidelberg is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 4 km from B&B Hotel Mannheim.

name: Premier Inn Mannheim City Centre
description: Facilities and services include car parking (extra charge), air conditioning, restaurant, free Wi-Fi, wheelchair access, elevator/lift, and lounge area.The rooms feature air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, coffee/tea maker, shower, hairdryer, bath, desk, and television.Address: Heinrich-von-Stephan-Str. 18, Mannheim 68161, Germany.Sembo

name: Hotel Kurpfalzstuben
description: This hotel is just a 4-minute walk from Mannheim Central Station. It offers soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi. Each of the non-smoking rooms at the family-run Hotel Kurpfalzstuben features cable TV and a modern bathroom. Varied breakfast buffets are prepared at the Kurpfalzstuben each day. The Hotel Kurpfalzstuben is close to all of Mannheim’s main attractions. These include the Mannheim Palace, just a 10-minute walk away. Private parking is available near the property.

name: Staytion Urban City Hotel Mannheim
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Staytion Urban City Hotel Mannheim is located in Mannheim, 800 metres from the University of Mannheim. The hotel has a bar to relax in, and there is a co-working station on the ground floor. Each room is individually-decorated and designed and includes a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. Guests can also enjoy the individually-decorated floors, each of which focuses on a specific artist. An on-site event room can also accommodate up to 200 attendees, while a conference room for 50 participants is also available. National Theatre Mannheim is 1.2 km from Staytion Urban City Hotel Mannheim, while Luisenpark is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Frankfurt Airport, 64 km from the property.

name: Novum Hotel Mannheim City
description: Located in Mannheim, the hotel is surrounded by a variety of shops and boutiques and is minutes on foot from Mannheim Hauptbahnhof. Those staying at the property can also take advantage of free wireless internet during their stay. This modern hotel provides family facilities, such as highchairs. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. Novum Hotel Mannheim City has 62 well-appointed rooms that are accompanied by a variety of essential amenities to ensure guests have an enjoyable stay. Entertainment options include a flat-screen TV and movies-on-demand. The hotel is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Mannheim, with Mannheim Palace just a short stroll away. University of Mannheim is a short stroll away.Revato

name: Hotel Restaurant Stern
description: Located in Mannheim, 4 km from Maimarkt Mannheim, Hotel Restaurant Stern provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers free WiFi. Luisenpark is 5.4 km away and National Theatre Mannheim is 7 km from the hotel. Mannheim Central Station is 8.4 km from the hotel, while University of Mannheim is 9.2 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 3 km from Hotel Restaurant Stern.

name: Hotel Restaurant Memo
description: Featuring a garden, restaurant, bar and free WiFi, Hotel Restaurant Memo is set in Mannheim, 1 km from National Theatre Mannheim and 2.5 km from Mannheim Central Station. The property is located 3.8 km from Luisenpark, 6.9 km from Maimarkt Mannheim and 19 km from Central Station Heidelberg. The property is allergy-free and is situated 3 km from University of Mannheim. The units at the hotel feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD player, and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Hotel Restaurant Memo every room includes bed linen and towels. Theatre Heidelberg is 22 km from the accommodation, while Castle Heidelberg is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 5 km from Hotel Restaurant Memo.

name: Smartments Business Mannheim Hauptbahnhof
description: SMARTments business Mannheim Hauptbahnhof has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Mannheim, 400 metres from Mannheim Central Station, 1.3 km from University of Mannheim and 1.6 km from National Theatre Mannheim. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchenette features a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine. Luisenpark is 2.7 km from the aparthotel, while Maimarkt Mannheim is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 6 km from SMARTments business Mannheim Hauptbahnhof.

name: Mood Contemporary living
description: Offering city views and free WiFi, Mood contemporary living offers accommodation well situated in the centre of Mannheim, within a short distance of University of Mannheim, Mannheim Central Station and National Theatre Mannheim. Featuring a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Luisenpark is 3.3 km from the aparthotel, while Maimarkt Mannheim is 6.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 7 km from Mood contemporary living.

name: Ibis Budget Mannheim Friedrichsfeld
description: The ibis budget Mannheim Friedrichsfeld, situated 10 minutes from the city center, is easily accessible via the A656 highway, which is just 1.2 miles (2 km) away. Free parking is available at the hotel. The hotel has 78 modern rooms, each accommodating up to 2 adults and 1 child under the age of 12. We offer free WIFI access and our buffet breakfast is available every morning.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Wegener
description: Centrally located in Mannheim, just a 5-minute walk from the historic university, this hotel offers a 24-hour reception and spacious rooms with free WiFi access. Hotel Wegener provides classically decorated rooms with rich carpets and a modern bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and guests can request a minibar for the room. A hearty buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hotel Wegener. Numerous cafés, restaurants and shops are all less than a 2-minute walk from the hotel. Nearby attractions include Mannheim Palace (800 metres), Market Square (1.5 km) and Jesuit Church (1.5 km). The SAP Arena is also 4 km from Hotel Wegener. Mannheim Central Train Station can be reached within a 4-minute walk from Hotel Wegener.

name: Die Villa
description: Located in Mannheim, near National Theatre Mannheim, Luisenpark and Mannheim Central Station, Die Villa features free WiFi, and guests can enjoy a garden and a terrace. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with kitchenware. University of Mannheim is 3.2 km from the aparthotel, while Maimarkt Mannheim is 5.5 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 3 km from Die Villa.

name: Hotel Luise Mannheim
description: This family-run hotel is situated directly in the shopping and pedestrian zone in the centre of Mannheim. It offers easy access to public transport and the A6 motorway. The Neckar river is just 5 minutes away. All rooms at the Hotel Luise Mannheim - by SuperFly Hotels feature a desk, a satellite TV and free WiFi. There is a shower in the private bathroom. The hotel was formerly known as Hotel Luxa, and has undergone a change of management. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the Hotel Luise Mannheim - by SuperFly Hotels. The city also has a selection of restaurants, bars and cafés. The Hotel Luise Mannheim - by SuperFly Hotels is a 20-minute walk from the Mannheim’s congress centre and the water tower. There is a tram stop just steps away from the Hotel Luise Mannheim - by SuperFly Hotels. Mannheim’s main railway station is a 20-minute walk away and offers rail links throughout the Rhine-Neckar area. Public parking spaces are available for a surcharge directly behind the hotel.

name: GuestHouse Mannheim
description: This accommodation is situated in the centre of Mannheim, a few minutes' walk from the main train station and the Rosengarten congress centre. Free WiFi is provided, and the underground garage can be used for a surcharge. GuestHouse Mannheim offers modern studios with a fully equipped kitchenette and flat-screen TV. Studios with a balcony facing the inner courtyard are available on request. Bars and restaurants can be found near GuestHouse Mannheim. Other nearby points of interest include the University of Mannheim, Luisenpark and Wasserturm. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 4 km away.

name: Pension Haus Baron 1 Neckarau
description: Boasting a garden, barbecue facilities and views of garden, Pension Haus Baron 1 Neckarau is located in Mannheim, 3.4 km from Luisenpark. The property is around 4 km from University of Mannheim, 4.1 km from National Theatre Mannheim and 5 km from Maimarkt Mannheim. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.2 km from Mannheim Central Station. The rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Pension Haus Baron 1 Neckarau also boast free WiFi. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Central Station Heidelberg is 17 km from Pension Haus Baron 1 Neckarau, while Theatre Heidelberg is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 5 km from the guest house.

name: Gästehaus Weingärtner
description: Situated on the banks of the River Neckar, in the Seckenheim district of Mannheim, this 3-star aparthotel provides good road and public transport connections to Mannheim and Heidelberg. The Gästehaus Weingärtner provides comfortable, stylish apartments each with a fully equipped kitchenette and a living area with TV. Free internet access is provided. Guests are welcome to enjoy breakfast or an evening drink in the main Hotel Weingärtner building, which is 200 metres from this guest house. Reservation for the restaurant is required. The Weingärtner is an ideal base for exploring the Rhine-Neckar region.

name: Hotel am Hafen
description: Set 1.6 km from University of Mannheim and 1.9 km from National Theatre Mannheim in the centre of Mannheim, Hotel am Hafen offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and shower. A microwave and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The bed and breakfast offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Barbecue facilities are included and guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Mannheim Central Station is 2.5 km from Hotel am Hafen, while Luisenpark is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

name: Rheincity Hotel
description: Providing free WiFi, RheinCity Hotel & Boardinghouse is located in Ludwigshafen am Rhein, within 1.7 km of Feierabendhaus der BASF. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area. All rooms have a kitchenette with a microwave, stovetop, toaster and electric kettle. All guest rooms at RheinCity Hotel feature air conditioning and a desk. A continental breakfast is offered daily. Guests can enjoy free coffee and tea throughout the day.

name: Speicher7 Hotel
description: Situated in Mannheim, less than 1 km from University of Mannheim, Speicher7 Hotel features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 1.6 km of Mannheim Central Station. The accommodation offers room service and free WiFi. At the hotel, rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and certain rooms come with city views. The rooms in Speicher7 Hotel are fitted with free toiletries and an iPod docking station. The daily breakfast offers continental, Italian or vegetarian options. National Theatre Mannheim is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Luisenpark is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 8 km from Speicher7 Hotel.

name: Hotel Weingärtner
description: This 3-star hotel in Mannheim’s peaceful district of Seckenheim boasts a charming timber-framed façade and easy access to central Mannheim and the historic university city of Heidelberg. Set in a converted tobacco barn from the 18th century, the Hotel Weingärtner offers country-style rooms and apartments featuring an individual design and handmade furniture. Help yourself to a comprehensive breakfast buffet in the morning. Try delicious regional specialities and fine local wines in the Weinstube lounge (reservation is required). During warmer months, you can also relax in the beer garden. The nearby A5 and A6 motorways and public transport links provide fast connections throughout the Neckar region.

name: Hotel Restaurant Alexandros
description: This family-run hotel to the north-east of Mannheim offers modern rooms with cable TV and free Wi-Fi. It enjoys excellent motorway and public transport connections. The Hotel-Restaurant Alexandros offers Greek hospitality and a friendly ambience. A rich breakfast buffet is available (for an extra cost) at the Hotel Alexandros each day from 06:15. The Alexandros restaurants serves a selection of Greek and international specialities. In fine weather guests can wine and dine in the beer garden of the Hotel-Restaurant Alexandros.

name: Hostel Mannheim
description: Featuring a shared lounge, a terrace as well as a bar, Hostel Mannheim is located in the centre of Mannheim, 700 metres from University of Mannheim. Among the facilities at this property are a tour desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen. All units are equipped with a fridge, dishwasher, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. All guest rooms at the hostel come with a shared bathroom and bed linen. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, vegetarian and vegan options. Mannheim Central Station is 1.4 km from Hostel Mannheim, while National Theatre Mannheim is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Budget Hotel Mannheim
description: Located in Mannheim, Budget Hotel Mannheim provides inner courtyard views and free WiFi, 8.1 km from National Theatre Mannheim and 9.2 km from Mannheim Central Station. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a fridge. Cycling can be enjoyed nearby. University of Mannheim is 10 km from the bed and breakfast, while Luisenpark is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 24 km from Budget Hotel Mannheim.

name: Central Hotel
description: This hotel is a short walk from Friedrichplatz square, the congress centre and Mannheim Main Station. Wi-Fi is free in all parts of the hotel. All rooms at the Hotel Central Mannheim feature cable TV and a private bathroom. The breakfast room at the Hotel Central offers views over the centre of Mannheim. There is a bar in the lounge. Newspapers and magazines are available.

name: Djh Jugendherberge Mannheim International
description: Only a 2-minute walk from the River Rhine, this hostel is conveniently located just 500 metres from Mannheim Central Train Station. It offers a buffet restaurant and simple accommodation with Wi-Fi access. The bright, private rooms and dormitories at DJH Jugendherberge Mannheim International are decorated in simple furniture. All rooms have a private bathroom with shower. Buffet breakfasts are served in the hostel’s modern dining room. Packed lunches, cooked lunches and dinners are available on request. The on-site barbecue facilities can be used during warm weather. Mannheim’s main attractions such as the Kunsthalle Art Gallery and Mannheim Palace are within 2 km of DJH Jugendherberge Mannheim International. Tourists can also spend a relaxing day at Luisenpark, just 4 km away. Free on-site parking is available. Lindenhofplatz tram stop is 400 metres from the hostel and provides easy connections around the city.

name: Stay@ma Boardinghouse Mannheim
description: Located within 3.2 km of Mannheim Central Station and 3.4 km of Luisenpark in Mannheim, STAY@MA Boardinghouse Mannheim provides accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. University of Mannheim is 4 km from the aparthotel, while National Theatre Mannheim is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 5 km from STAY@MA Boardinghouse Mannheim.

name: Annie´s Appartements
description: Boasting a garden, Annie´s Appartements is situated in Mannheim in the Baden-Württemberg region, 7.6 km from Maimarkt Mannheim and 9.3 km from Luisenpark. The property is around 11 km from National Theatre Mannheim, 11 km from Mannheim Central Station and 12 km from Central Station Heidelberg. The guest house has family rooms. All rooms at the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen. With a private bathroom fitted with a a bath or shower and a hair dryer, rooms at Annie´s Appartements also boast free WiFi. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. University of Mannheim is 12 km from the accommodation, while Theatre Heidelberg is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 8 km from Annie´s Appartements.

name: Rnk Hotel By Wmm Hotels
description: Located in Brühl, 11 km from Maimarkt Mannheim, RNK Hotel by WMM Hotels provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 12 km from Mannheim Central Station, 13 km from Luisenpark and 13 km from University of Mannheim. National Theatre Mannheim is 14 km away and Hockenheimring is 14 km from the hotel. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, while certain rooms include a kitchenette. At RNK Hotel by WMM Hotels all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Central Station Heidelberg is 15 km from the accommodation, while Theatre Heidelberg is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 11 km from RNK Hotel by WMM Hotels.
